posts.post_content:
I'm looking for low grades, preferably graded (grades 2 and under) examples for my type collection. I prefer HOFers, but since I'm trying to stick to a reasonable budget, I'll look at commons and raw examples as well. 

Light trimming/Altered/Marked/Stamped/Creased/Color Enhanced is okay
Paper loss needs to be at a minimum.

N300 Mayo
N28/N29 Allen & Ginters
N162 Goodwin
N172/N173 Old Judge
N284 Buchner
1889 E.R. Williams Game
Anything else you might have!

Looking for baseball players only.

Ive got a few examples of what youre looking for on my ebid page linked below.

Good luck!

Not sure if you are interested in this or not, but if you are let me know.
[url]mhgt2833@gmail.com[/url]

Mike

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/cardsforsale/websize/Gypsy%20Queen%20Yank%20Robinson.jpg[/IMG]
Hi Mike - I sent you an email.
